title: Explosion in Connecticut injures multiple officers
text:
Explosion in Connecticut injures multiple officers 8:04am BST - 00:59
Police say at least eight tactical officers were injured after an explosion at a home where they had been called to a domestic violence incident. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Police say at least eight tactical officers were injured after an explosion at a home where they had been called to a domestic violence incident. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
